product.name: GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum
product.tagline: Brighten Up with Vitamin C Power
product.headline: Unlock Radiant Skin with 10% Vitamin C GlowBoost Serum
product.description: Unlock a radiant glow with GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum, powered by 10% Vitamin C and Hyaluronic Acid to deliver unparalleled brightening and dark spot-fading results. This potent serum is specially formulated to tackle uneven skin tone, leaving you with a more even and luminous complexion. Perfect for oily and combination skin types, GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum absorbs quickly and works tirelessly to reveal your natural glow. By harnessing the synergistic power of Vitamin C and Hyaluronic Acid, this serum provides a transformative skincare experience that will leave your skin looking brighter, smoother, and more radiant than ever.

ingredient_details.name: Vitamin C
ingredient_details.description: A powerful antioxidant that helps brighten and even out skin tone, reducing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles

ingredient_details.name: Hyaluronic Acid
ingredient_details.description: A natural humectant that retains moisture, providing long-lasting hydration and leaving skin feeling soft, smooth, and supple

how_to_use.raw_instructions: Apply 2–3 drops in the morning before sunscreen
how_to_use.summary: Apply 2–3 drops in the morning before sunscreen

steps: Apply 2-3 drops of GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum to your face and neck in the morning
Gently massage the serum into your skin until it is fully absorbed
tips: Use GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum consistently for optimal results
Always apply sunscreen after using the serum

usage_warnings.mitigation: Start with a patch test, reduce frequency of application or discontinue use if irritation persists

usage_warnings.consequence: Irritation, redness, or burning sensation in the eyes
usage_warnings.mitigation: Wash hands before applying, avoid applying near the eye area, and rinse eyes thoroughly with water if contact occurs

suitability_flags.flag: Not suitable for dry or sensitive skin
suitability_flags.reason: 10% Vitamin C may exacerbate dryness or irritation
suitability_flags.alternative: Consider a lower concentration of Vitamin C or a product formulated for dry or sensitive skin

medium.consequence: Irritation, redness, or burning sensation in the eyes
medium.mitigation: Wash hands before applying, avoid applying near the eye area, and rinse eyes thoroughly with water if contact occurs

low.mitigation: Start with a patch test, reduce frequency of application or discontinue use if irritation persists

usage_warnings.mitigation: Start with a patch test, reduce frequency of application or discontinue use if irritation persists

usage_warnings.consequence: Irritation, redness, or burning sensation in the eyes
usage_warnings.mitigation: Wash hands before applying, avoid applying near the eye area, and rinse eyes thoroughly with water if contact occurs

suitability_flags.flag: Not suitable for dry or sensitive skin
suitability_flags.reason: 10% Vitamin C may exacerbate dryness or irritation
suitability_flags.alternative: Consider a lower concentration of Vitamin C or a product formulated for dry or sensitive skin

expanded_safety.storage: Store in a cool, dry place, away from direct sunlight and out of reach of children
precautions: Avoid using with other exfoliating products or retinoids
Discontinue use if irritation or allergic reaction occurs
